net.fathomsoft.nova.error

Class SyntaxMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.fathomsoft.nova.error.SyntaxMessage

  • public class SyntaxMessage
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that outputs an error of a specific type.

      • queryError

        public static boolean queryError(java.lang.String message,
                 Node node,
                 boolean require)
        Check whether or not to output an error message from the compiler. The output is dependent on whether or not require is true. If require is false, this method simply returns false.
        Parameters:
        message - The message describing the error.
        node - The node that the error occurred from.
        require - Whether or not to follow through with the error output.

      • queryWarning

        public static boolean queryWarning(java.lang.String message,
                   Node node,
                   boolean require)
        Check whether or not to output a warning message from the compiler. The output is dependent on whether or not require is true. If require is false, this method simply returns false.
        Parameters:
        message - The message describing the warning.
        node - The node that the warning occurred from.
        require - Whether or not to follow through with the error output.

      • queryError

        public static boolean queryError(java.lang.String message,
                 Node node,
                 boolean throwException,
                 boolean require)
        Check whether or not to output an error message from the compiler. The output is dependent on whether or not require is true. If require is false, this method simply returns false.
        Parameters:
        message - The message describing the error.
        node - The node that the error occurred from.
        throwException - Whether or not to throw a SyntaxErrorException.
        require - Whether or not to follow through with the error output.

                   Node node,
                   Location location,
